Package gameplay

Class Summary
Carnivorous Overview
Carnivorous is a subclass of the Dinosaur class.
ConfirmPlayer  
CreateNewCustomPlayerTest Overview of the type
Dinosaur Overview
In the game, the class Dinosaur stores information about each dinosaur of a certain player.
DinosaurIDManager Overview
DinosaurIDManager is a singleton class that manages a finite pool of String, created ensuring that each String is unique in the pool.
EndTest  
Game Overview
Game is the main class of the gameplay package.

Player Overview
In the game, the class Player stores information about each player registered on the server.
Species Overview
The Species class contains informations about a species of dinosaurs owned by a player Species is the parent class of SpeciesCarnivorous and SpeciesHerbivore This includes: Its current turn number The list of dinosaurs Its maximum size The list of cells discovered Its name The player who owns it Its score Its maximum number of turns Collaborators
Species, Dinosaur
SpeciesCarnivorous  
SpeciesCarnivorousFactory Overview
The class SpeciesCarnivorousFactory is a singleton factory that lets you create carnivorous species of dinosaurs.
SpeciesFactory The class SpeciesFactory is a factory that let you create species of dinosaurs.
SpeciesHerbivore  
SpeciesHerbivoreFactory Overview
The class SpeciesCarnivorousFactory is a singleton factory that let you create herbivorous species of dinosaurs.

Enum Summary
GameState GameState is an enumerator which contains the possible game states
PlayerStatus Overview
The PlayerStatus is an enumerator that represents the actual status of a player in the server.
